entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
